title: The Summer Vibes Giveaway: A New Bike Rally in Colorado
content:
Introducing a new event in the Front Range of Colorado, Summer Vibes Festival will kick off the start to the best time of year in the Rocky Mountains over the solstice weekend. We’re partnering with Summer Vibes to give away a prize package for the event weekend, including a free bike, *limited edition* Radavist x Ripton jorts, free lodging and more! Read on to get the sweet deets.

The Radavist is stoked to be partnering with Summer Vibes Bike Rally & Run Festival for an incredible VIP giveaway. Here’s what’s up for grabs:

  • Grand Prize: A Trek Checkpoint SL5 AXS Gen 3 gravel bike, 2-night hotel stay at the A-Lodge in Lyons, 2 pairs of Ripton x Radavist jorts, & 2 ticket upgrades to VIP passes at Summer Vibes.
  • Second Place winner: 2 pairs of Ripton x Radavist jorts
  • Third Place: 2 VIP upgrades to Summer Vibes Bike Rally & Run Festival.
  • Earn multiple contest entries by following the Instagram page, registering for Summer Vibes, joining The Radavist and Summer Vibes newsletters, and spreading the word about the event! There is no purchase necessary to enter. (Travel to Colorado is NOT included in the grand prize.) Contest ends on June 1, 2025!
  • Enter here!

Read on below for more about this first-year event.

Summer Vibes is Coming to Colorado June 21, 2025

There’s a new mountain festival for adventure seekers coming to Colorado: SUMMER VIBES Bike Rally and & Run Fest. Designed to be a “Coachella for cyclists and runners,” the weekend will feature two gravel bike rallies, a dirt jump jam, trail running races, a huge concert, onsite tent/van/rv camping, lounge pools, saunas, and local food and drink all at the gateway to the Rocky Mountains in Lyons, CO.

Bohn Park will serve as the Summer Vibes Fest base camp, a beautiful park with expansive mountain views. This is the same venue as the Old Man Winter Rally, one of the country’s most popular winter cycling and running events. As Old Man Winter’s sister event, Summer Vibes will bring the same adventurous and fun spirit, but with the addition of more mountainous terrain since the Colorado winter snow will be melted. “Now that Old Man Winter Rally is well-established as an ‘epic winter adventure’, we thought it would be rad to create a summer sister event for runners and riders that combines Old Man Winter Rally with a destination music festival vibe,” explains Josh Kravetz, President of AF Events, the production company behind both events. The first edition of the Summer Vibes Festival will take place on Saturday June 21st, 2025, with camping available from 6/20-6/21. Come ride, run, party and camp with us to kick off summer over the solstice weekend!

Events at Summer Vibes Fest include:

  • Mountain Gravel Bike Rally (72-mile) & Rolling Gravel Bike Rally (32-mile)
  • Altra Trail Run Relay and the return of “The Beer Relay”
  • Mixed terrain 5-Mile Run
  • Traction Coffee Grip & Rip Dirt Jump Jam (Pro and Amateur categories)
  • Lounge Pools and wood-burning saunas
  • Trail Dog 5-Mile Run
  • Live music from The Goonies, Kind Hearted Strangers, and Crooked Rugs
  • Free Woom kids bike races
  • A huge ‘Bohnfire’
  • Onsite camping for tents, rvs, and vehicles with rooftop tents
  • A wide variety of cold beers, healthy drinks, great food vendors
  • Family fun including inflatables, kick bike races, and kids contests

Follow Summer Vibes on Instagram and register here!

Big thanks to our event partners: REI Coop, Trek Bikes, Altra Running, Woom Bikes, Oskar Blues Brewing, The Radavist, Cemex, Suerte Tequila, and the Town of Lyons. Companies interested in partnerships or vendor space can reach out to: sponsorship@adventurefit.com

About AF Events: Adventure Fit is a Boulder, CO, based Experiential Event Marketing and Production company that specializes in Active Entertainment productions. Connecting community is what drives Adventure Fit to develop creative events and results-driven solutions for our partners. Adventure Fit has produced some of the country’s most popular “active entertainment” events, such as the New Belgium Urban Assault Ride, Burning Can Fest at the Lyons Outdoor Games, and the Shape Diva Dash. Events managed by Adventure Fit include: Triple Bypass Ride, The Bailey Hundo, The Yeti Gathering, and more.
